summary: using the dawnbreaker model, i made basic versions of the what i have dubbed the Paladin\'s Blade
descriptionHtml:
this mod lets you create different more powerful versions of the paladin\'s blade, using the model of the dawnbreaker, but without the enchantment, and its a lot more powerful, to get the sword to appear you need to take the heavy armour route, new version for every level up to Daedric, will look at making an enchanted version, but not sure how to do it *yet*, hope you enjoy my mod.

should be simple to install using the mod manager, if not, just download manually and place the esp in your data folder, and have it last in your load order.
author: Solgath
